item.title: Meghan add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "I like beautiful melodies telling me terrible things." -- Tom Waits

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Meghan add a quote by W.Somerset Maugham
item.description: "When you choose your friends, don't be short-changed by choosing personality over character." -- W.Somerset Maugham

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The world is a dangerous place to live, not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The best way to cheer yourself is to cheer somebody else up." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Meghan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book." -- John Green

item.title: Meghan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive." -- John Green

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Sometimes people don't want to hear the truth because they don't want their illusions destroyed." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Meghan add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Every generation imagines itself to be more intelligent than the one that went before it, and wiser than the one that comes after it." -- George Orwell

item.title: Meghan add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "We shall meet in the place where there is no darkness." -- George Orwell

item.title: Meghan add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I'm a cynical idealist." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Meghan add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Whenever you feel like criticizing any one...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "Don't bend; don't water it down; don't try to make it logical; don't edit your own soul according to the fashion. Rather, follow your most intense obsessions mercilessly." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "First impressions are always unreliable." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Meghan add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "We need the books that affect us like a disaster, that grieve us deeply, like the death of someone we loved more than ourselves, like being banished into forests far from everyone, like a suicide. A book must be the axe for the frozen sea inside us." -- Franz Kafka
